metadata.name: SCR File Write Event
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of screensaver files (.scr) outside of system folders. Attackers may execute an application as an ".SCR" file using "rundll32.exe desk.cpl,InstallScreenSaver" for example.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.scr')) AND NOT (contains(lower(file.path), lower(':\\\\$windows.~bt\\\\newos\\\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\syswow64\\\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\winsxs\\\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower(':\\\\wudownloadcache\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of screensaver files (.scr) outside of system folders. Attackers may execute an application as an ".SCR" file using "rundll32.exe desk.cpl,InstallScreenSaver" for example.

metadata.objective: False positive: The installation of new screen savers by third party software Reference: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Libraries/Desk/
